mapper.select: select vo.*,(case when vo.defer_status = 1 then '已开启' else '未开启' end) defer_status_fmt ,(case when vo.trail_stop_loss = 1 then '开' else '关' end) trail_stop_loss_fmt,vo.user_commit_buy_date,vo.user_commit_sell_date ,vo.order_id,vo.sys_set_sell_date,vo.user_id,vo.investor_id ,(case when vo.sell_trigger_type = 100 then '用户平仓' when vo.sell_trigger_type = 101 then '人工结算' when vo.sell_trigger_type = 102 then '系统清仓' when vo.sell_trigger_type = 103 then '风控触发' end) balance_type_fmt ,concat(LEFT(vo.security_code,1),'*****',RIGHT(vo.security_code,1)) security_code ,(case when vo.trade_direction = 1 then '看多' else '看空' end) trade_type_fmt ,(case when vo.display = 0 then '隐藏' else '显示' end) display_fmt,vo.rate,er.currency,vo.actual_hold_fund,vo.actual_defer_fund,vo.defer_interest ,er.sign from v_order_score_info vo JOIN exchange_rate er on(vo.current_rate_id=er.id) where vo.order_id=#{id}
